Description: Information on the estimated number of persons sleeping rough over a two week period and the number of persons observed sleeping rough.
Name: Rough Sleeper Count
Route from landing page to data: Data can be found on this landing page in the form of Power BI.
Sizing Notes: Available through the odata route, so simple to get, but may need a number of separate downloads / produce a number of different data sets, so needs a fair amount of up-front analysis
